title: Massive 82 in Samsung QLED 8K with Apple TV unboxing!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - Hey, guys, it's Justine, and today, we have the new Samsung 8K QLED TV. This is the 82-inch version. We saw this at CES, this year, and it was absolutely amazing, and guess what. It is here, and we are about to unbox it. Side note, it's really heavy. Could we just, this doesn't even span the length of my arms. (bright music) Let's unbox. Now I don't shoot my content in 8K just yet, but with the 8K AI Upscaling, it ensures that my content looks amazing, even if it isn't 8K. I'm gonna let this go, and it's gonna just be like a big reveal. (Justine gasps) (Justine sighs) There's a lot of stuff going on. Let me resort back to my manual (chuckles). Wow. Oh, these are the legs. All right, I'm gonna get these legs on this thing, and then we're gonna set it up on the TV stand and get it all set up. (dramatic music) A good day, friend - Goodness. I wish that all of you guys were here, right now, in this room, witnessing what I'm witnessing right now. - Hello, and we're all good. (Justine gasps) - We're in. One of the things that I've noticed already is, normally, sitting on the floor at this angle with any other television, you would not be able to get a clear view of the TV, because viewing angles can be so finicky, but with this, it has an ultra-viewing angle, so basically, anywhere that you are in the room, you're gonna have a really great view of the TV. So here's ambient mode. This is kinda cool, because usually, if your screen is off, it'll just be a black screen, which is kinda boring. But this has all kinds of really cool things. You can add things like the weather or the time or latest news headlines. Listen. (water pattering) I feel like I'm in the tub right now. These look so good, wow! Anytime I'm done editing a video, I love to see what it looks like on a television, and now this is so easy to do, because with AirPlay 2, all I have to do is, I can export my video, and then I'm just gonna share it, using AirPlay 2, and like magic, it's on your TV. AirPlay 2 support isn't just in this TV. It is available as a firmware upgrade to 2018 Samsung Smart TVs, and it's kind of crazy, because this is available in 190 countries, worldwide. It is the first to have the Apple TV app integrated in the TV platform. No external hardware is needed. And the new app brings over 100,000 movies and TV shows, and you can subscribe to premium channels like HBO and Showtime. And you can even AirPlay music. I have an incredible royalty-free track here, prepared just for you. ("Bombs Away") You can also share YouTube videos, much like this video from CES, where I'm actually looking at this TV, in Vegas. Here, it's showing you how we're able to use AI and upscale content. So content that is not ready for 8K televisions-- Did you hear what Justine, several months ago, just said? She was talking, well, wait, I'm she. Me, I, I was talking about the AI upscaling, which is something that is really fascinating to me, because I don't yet shoot in 8K. So it will automatically be upscaled to look incredible on this television. And one of the great things about this TV, that I may have mentioned before, is the Ultra Viewing Angle is incredible. So you can be anywhere in the room and still have a perfect view of the screen. No one ever sees me, sees me Losing every battle - We've been talking a lot about 8K content, so let's view some 8K content.
